sellerCard.oneLiner: Expert in Full Stack Development and UI UX Design
sellerCard.description:
Greetings! I'm Arif Mahmud and excited to welcomeü§ó you to my profile.

At SM Technology, we have an experienced Full-Stack Development and UX/UI Design team that is committed to staying updated with the latest technology trends.

We have 4+ years of expertise in creating intuitive and engaging user interfaces for web applications and have successfully completed 1000+ projects worldwide.

Whether you need a business website, personal blog, eCommerce store, or any other website design, I've got you covered.

Just click the "contact me" button to get in touch and enjoy the premium services.

description.content:
Are you looking for an experienced Full-Stack Web Developer to turn your creative ideas into reality?


You've come to the right place!


I'm Arif Mahmud, an experienced full-stack web developer. I lead an agency, SM Technology, based in Dhaka, Bangladesh.


At SM Technology, we have a team of 20+ experienced Full-Stack Developers who are experts in creating a unique, functional, and visually appealing custom website that perfectly aligns with your brand identity.



Services We Offer:


  • Complete Frontend and Backend Development
  • Custom Website Development
  • Figma to Website Conversion
  • Secure REST API Development
  • Seamless API Integration
  • E-commerce Functionality
  • Payment Gateway Integration
  • SEO Optimization
  • Responsive Design with Mobile Optimization



Technologies We Specialize In:


Frontend: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React JS, Next JS, Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap, Material UI

Backend: PHP Laravel, Node JS, Express JS

Databases: MySQL, MongoDB, PostgreSQL



Why Choose Us:


  • Quality Work & On-time Delivery
  • 100% Satisfaction
  • 24/7 Ongoing Support
  • Ô∏è30 Days of Free Support After Completion



Contact me now for a free consultation and GET a stunning custom website that drives your business forward.

slide.name: do website development as full stack web developer, front end, backend developer

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do you need from me to build my custom website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I will need details of your project requirements and your complete cooperation to achieve the best possible results for you.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do I need to provide for the Figma to Website conversion?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Simply share your Figma design files and any specific requirements. I'll take care of the rest!

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you assist with website maintenance after development?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Absolutely! I offer ongoing support and maintenance services to ensure your website continues to perform at its best.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How can I request revisions?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: We provide a set number of revisions based on your package. You can request changes through the platform's messaging system.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you help with branding and logo design?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: While my primary focus is on website development, I can collaborate with designers to help with branding and logo design.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How do you ensure the security of my website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I implement best practices for website security, including SSL certificates, secure coding practices, and regular updates.

openGraph.title: do website development as full stack web developer, front end, backend developer

reviews.comment: Designed a good website. However tortured me so much until he transferred it. He keeps saying I will check and get back to you. He transferred it first to a domain that was not mine. The problem is that when there is any issue, he doesn't ask, he just leaves it and keeps promising he'll get back to you, and never does. In the end the website was transferred to me with a lot of errors, media was not displaying and I had to re edit it my self. The seller can do good stuff as per the design but he definitely has communication problems.

seller_response.comment: Regrettably, this rating does not accurately reflect the services I delivered. I completed the project based on the client‚Äôs instructions and ensured all changes were made according to their needs. However, the client did not provide full details regarding the changes they required. I reviewed the entire website and made updates based on the instructions provided. At times, additional time was needed to thoroughly check the issues, which I communicated to the client with, "I will check it and get back to you soon." The client also requested a number of tasks and changes that were outside of our original agreement, which took extra time to complete. Furthermore, the client took considerable time to provide the necessary details for transferring the website, and there were technical issues with the client‚Äôs domain and hosting, specifically with the DNS, which was not part of our agreement and took extra time to resolve. Despite these challenges, the client expressed satisfaction with the project. Here is the screenshot for reference: https://prnt.sc/ZtEBRP1zepsg. That said, I remain fully dedicated to my clients and am always willing to make any additional adjustments as necessary to ensure their satisfaction.

reviews.comment: Arif was great at creating custom features for my website and he was very timely with the delivery. He was able to turn around my website and create a great look. He was very professional and was able to provide custom features for a reasonable price.

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your appreciation! üòä It was a pleasure working on your website and bringing your vision to life. I‚Äôm glad you‚Äôre happy with the custom features and overall look. If you ever need any further updates or assistance, feel free to reach out. Wishing you all the best with your website! üöÄ

reviews.comment:
!!!Customer Warning!!!
I rarely write negative reviews, but my experience warrants sharing this as a cautionary tale. I hired Arif to build a stock portfolio website for $1,500, divided into three deliverables. As part of the project, I provided him with the username and password to the website I wanted replicated. My intention, as a software developer, was to use his foundational work as a basis for me to upgrade and maintain the website going forward.

The first deliverable was to create Figma files for the entire website, for which I paid $369.25. We agreed upon the requirements, and he was given 10 days to complete the design with slight modifications to the reference website I provided. I followed up three days before the deadline, and he reassured me that everything was on track. However, on the day of the deadline, he delivered two incomplete and carelessly hand-drawn pages that fell drastically short of expectations. To provide context, I‚Äôve attached a public link showcasing the work he submitted.

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1IVjTDz9nT831pJiMQVry_DhpTitbQ0sA/view?usp=sharing

Despite his high ratings, my experience suggests they may not reflect the reality of his work. I strongly recommend seeking an alternative freelancer for your project needs.

Arif Mahamud is a stellar website developer! His PROFESSIONALISM and CODE EXPERTISE truly stand out, combined with top-notch documentation. Working with him was seamless, thanks to his LANGUAGE FLUENCY and deep understanding of the project. Very efficient, good communication, and recommended for everyone who wants a professional worker. üëç

seller_response.comment:
Thanks, I'm glad you got what you wanted. I would love to work with you again.

Much appreciated, Thank you. Hope we can establish a long-term business relationship.

reviews.comment: Arif is awesome to work with! He speaks fluent English and grasps and delivers what you want done. We have already hired him to do a second project and have a third lined up. I highly recommend him! :)

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your kind words and trust! It‚Äôs been an absolute pleasure working with you, and I‚Äôm excited to continue delivering great results for your projects.
